channel.title: VPS on Tom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VPS on Tom's Blog

item.title: VPS常用命令
item.description: 宝塔面板 # centos yum install -y wget && wget -O install.sh http://download.bt.cn/install/install_6.0.sh && sh install.sh # ubuntu/deepin wget -O install.sh http://download.bt.cn/install/install-ubuntu_6.0.sh && sudo bash install.sh # debian wget -O install.sh http://download.bt.cn/install/install-ubuntu_6.0.sh && bash install.sh # fedora wget -O install.sh http://download.bt.cn/install/install_6.0.sh && bash install.sh # 更新 curl http://download.bt.cn/install/update6.sh|bash # 删除登录验证(适用于 7.8.0 以前版本) sed -i "s|if (bind_user == 'True') {|if (bind_user == 'REMOVED') {|g" /www/server/panel/BTPanel/static/js/index.js rm -rf /www/server/panel/data/bind.pl # 还原绑定 sed -i "s|if (bind_user == 'REMOVED') {|if (bind_user == 'True') {|g" /www/server/panel/BTPanel/static/js/index.
